titles.title: CLAW Act of 2022
CLAW Act of 2022
Conserving Lobstering And Whales Act of 2022
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against tax for the purchase of certain adaptive gear required to prevent the entanglement of right whales.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Conserving Lobstering And Whales Act of 2022 or the CLAW Act of 2022
This bill allows an eligible lobstering business a new tax credit for 30% of the cost of any adaptive gear required to prevent the entanglement of right whales.
